TextView.android:text:
* Some UI improvement.
* Space-bar gesture preview.
* Layouts and Themes now have screenshot support, when clicking on their icon in settings.
* Some word prediction fine-tunings.
* Easily adding and removing words from the user-dictionary directly from the suggestions bar (double tap to add, fling up to remove)
* New translations: IW, PT, CA, DA, EL, MY, Pl, NL and all new TR (Turkish) and CS (Czech).
* Critical crash on Android 1.5 fix.
* Bug fixes.
